title: The future of Sociology with Jim Hunter and Louise Owusu-Kwarteng
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Jim Hunter and Louise Owusu-Kwarteng about where we are at with the subject of Sociology. The discussion looks and the current limitations and frustrations of both learning and teaching the subject and leads into talk of where do we go from here for the future of Sociology.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
